description: Persians are a cavalry civilization that excels in boom strategies and heavy cavalry.
dark_age: Start with 3 villagers and a scout.
Build 2 houses, a mill near berries, and a lumber camp near forests.
Train additional villagers from the town center.
Train 4-5 spearmen from the barracks to defend against scout rushes.
Use the scout to explore the map and find resources.
Advance to Feudal Age at around 16-17 minutes with 500 food and 200 gold.
Have around 1000-1200 food, 200-300 wood, and 150-200 gold at the end of the Dark Age.
Assign 8-10 villagers to food, 4-5 to wood, 1-2 to gold, and 2-3 to stone.
feudal_age: Build a stable and produce scouts or knights depending on the situation.
Build a blacksmith and market to upgrade units and sell excess resources for gold.
Build a second town center and start producing additional villagers.
Advance to Castle Age at around 23-24 minutes with 800 food and 400 gold.
Have around 2000-2500 food, 800-1000 wood, 500-600 gold, and 300-400 stone at the end of the Feudal Age.
Assign 20-25 villagers to food, 10-12 to wood, 4-5 to gold, and 4-5 to stone.
castle_age: Continue producing knights and research Bloodlines and Husbandry upgrades.
Build a siege workshop and produce Mangonels or Scorpions to counter archers.
Build a third town center and start producing more villagers.
Advance to Imperial Age at around 30-31 minutes with 1000 food, 800 gold, and 400 stone.
Have around 4000-5000 food, 1500-2000 wood, 1200-1500 gold, and 800-1000 stone at the end of the Castle Age.
Assign 40-50 villagers to food, 20-25 to wood, 8-10 to gold, and 8-10 to stone.
imperial_age: Continue producing heavy cavalry and research Elite War Elephant upgrade.
Use War Elephants to destroy buildings and absorb damage while knights deal damage.
Have around 6000-8000 food, 3000-4000 wood, and 3000-4000 gold in the late Imperial Age.
Assign 60-70 villagers to food, 30-35 to wood, 16-20 to gold, and 16-20 to stone.
